title: Yasuo can buy 2 items, and be completely relevant even after getting destroyed in lane
body: Is this suppose to be balanced? You can go 5-0 against a Yasuo in lane, but as soon as he buys a shiv and CoA he can walk into a fight and can completely destroy champs. Most champs that go 0-5 in lane need a shit ton of time to catch up and be relevant.

replies.body: 0-5 and he probably has more farm than you anyways.
Thing is, literally every Yasuo outfarms their opponent because of the retarded safe farming abilities he has.

> [{quoted}](name=CataclysmG,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=3Yeue7vQ,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-01-12T02:11:16.167+0000)
>
> Thing is, literally every Yasuo outfarms their opponent because of the retarded safe farming abilities he has.

No he doesn't, his farming is not safe enough to be called "retarded".

What i meant by the last post was that killing your opponent in lane doesn't matter if you don't outfarm him, you're meant to comeback in to the game if you farm enough even if you had a rough laning phase.

Also that BS about him becoming relevant again with Shiv and Cloak is not true. If it was Shiv and IE then i'd agree and even then a Yasuo who falls behind is useless except for wind wall, even his ultimate is useless because it will do no damage and he'll get instagibbed the moment his falls from his ultimate.

I realize what you meant.

I'm just saying that I've almost never seen a Yasuo player sub 300 farm at 30 minutes, myself included.
honestly a 0/5 yasuo in lane shouldnt be able to get any farm, 4 levels behind and wont ever reach the two item.

When you have to leave lane to help your struggling top or bot, yea.....he gets free farm for a few mins. It doesn't take much gold to buy 2 items and suddenly, he's completely relevant. Buy armour? Why? so his ult can just shred it all?

The issue is comparing him to most mages. Lissandra, Malz, Swain, Xerath, Lux......list goes on. If any of those champs get shit on in lane, it takes forever for them to get back on their feet in order to do something manageable in a team fight. Yas can ult 2- 3 people, zip around with E and suddenly he has a triple kill.
He can't ulti 2-3 people in fights unless someone else knocks up for him and if they have the Malphite/Yasuo combo or the Wukong/Yasuo combo you shouldn't be all grouped together.
right 1/12 yasuo gets 2 items and goes legendary. every damn game. he doesn't need to be good. his autos are 1/3 of your health at that point.

Uh, because that isn't how that works

Rushing 100% crit when you have 90 AD and 10% crit reduction with no armor pen means you're running around autoattacking people for a ball breaking 172 pre-mitigation damage on a champion that can't build flat armor pen until their 3rd item at the earliest

Or for 3400g (the cost of Shiv + CoA) I could just be playing Zed with a Ghostblade, doing the same amount of autoattack damage but with armor pen, CDR, and the active AS/MS
